column4: I did sudo adduser $USER groupx and I don't want to log out because I'm in the middle of something. Is there any way to refresh my group memberships without logging out?
you could 'ssh in' or start a xterm with a login shell..perhaps.. but that would do it just for that one shell
its a bit of a pain :)
midi files are radicially different then wav, or other sampled  audio files.
